nodes.text: Jon was a male Corellian living in Coronet City during the the Galactic War. During the Battle of Corellia in 3640 BBY Jon had an argument with his wife and went out to clear his head. Unfortunately, when the rocket trams stopped working, he got trapped in the Axial Park.
Jon is mentioned in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic during an ambient conversation at Blastfield Shipyards rocket tram station.
